extDescription.message: Voice input for any website with context correction, expandable menu, clear input, and auto-submit features. SPA compatible.

menuTooltip.description: Tooltip for the main menu button.

clearTooltip.message:
Clear Input Field
Clears the content of the current input field

proofreadTooltip.message:
Proofread Content (GPT-4.1)
Proofreads the entire content with the high-accuracy model

editTooltip.message:
Edit Text (GPT-4.1)
Edit input field content based on instructions

settingsTooltip.message:
Settings
Configure API key and language

historyTooltip.message:
History
View past voice input entries

statusListeningAppend.description: Status message when listening in append mode.

statusInputFound.description: Status message when an input field is found/selected.

statusInputNotFound.description: Status message when no input field is found.

statusClearSuccess.description: Status message when input field is cleared.

statusClearNotFound.message: Input field to clear not found
statusClearNotFound.description: Status message when no input field is found to clear.

statusProofreadingModel.description: Status message during proofreading indicating the model.

statusProofreadSuccess.description: Status message when proofreading is successful.

statusProofreadErrorDetail.description: Status message when proofreading fails with details.

statusProofreadNotFound.message: Input field for proofreading not found
statusProofreadNotFound.description: Status message when no input field is found for proofreading.

statusProofreadEmpty.description: Status message when trying to proofread empty content.

statusTwitterNotSupported.message: x.com is not currently supported. Support will be added in a future update.
statusTwitterNotSupported.description: Status message shown when trying to use voice input on Twitter/X.com, which is not supported.

statusEditNotFound.message: No input field found for editing
statusEditNotFound.description: Status message when no input field is found for editing.

statusEditEmpty.description: Status message when trying to edit empty content.

statusEditInstructionEmpty.description: Status message when edit instruction is empty.

statusEditListening.description: Status message when listening for edit instructions.

statusEditListeningInterim.description: Status message when showing interim results for edit instructions.

statusEditInstructionReceived.description: Status message when edit instruction is received.

statusEditing.description: Status message during editing with GPT.

statusEditingComplete.description: Status message when editing is complete.

statusApiKeyMissing.message: API key not set. Please set it via the settings button.
statusApiKeyMissing.description: Status message when API key is missing.

statusApiKeyInvalid.description: Status message for invalid API key format.

statusApiKeySaveSuccess.description: Status message when API key is saved successfully.

statusApiKeySaveError.description: Status message when API key saving fails.

statusSpeechErrorNoSpeech.description: Speech recognition error: no speech detected.

statusSpeechErrorAudioCapture.description: Speech recognition error: audio capture failed.

statusSpeechErrorNotAllowed.description: Speech recognition error: microphone permission denied.

statusSpeechStartError.description: Error message when speech recognition fails to start.

statusSpeechStop.description: Status message when speech input is stopped.

statusCorrectionSuccess.description: Status message when GPT correction is successful.

statusCorrectionError.description: Status message when GPT correction fails.

statusCorrectionSkip.message: API key not set. Skipping correction.
statusCorrectionSkip.description: Status message when skipping correction due to missing API key.

statusCorrectionApiError.description: Status message for OpenAI API errors.

statusCorrectionApiKeyInvalid.message: Invalid API key. Please check settings.
statusCorrectionApiKeyInvalid.description: Status message for invalid API key from API response.

statusCorrectionResponseError.description: Status message for unexpected API response.

modalSettingsDescription.message: Enter your API key for automatic voice recognition correction (gpt-4o-mini) and manual proofreading (gpt-4.1). The key is stored locally in the extension's storage and used only for OpenAI API calls.
modalSettingsDescription.description: Description text in the settings modal.

modalSettingsInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the API key input field.

modalSettingsLangLabel.description: Label for the language selection dropdown in settings.

settingAutoDetectInputFieldsLabel.description: Label for the setting to enable/disable automatic input field detection.

settingAutoDetectTooltipOn.description: Tooltip for the auto-detect setting when ON.

settingAutoDetectTooltipOff.description: Tooltip for the auto-detect setting when OFF.

settingAutoCorrectionLabel.description: Label for the setting to enable/disable automatic correction after voice recognition.

settingAutoCorrectionTooltipOn.description: Tooltip for the auto-correction setting when ON.

settingAutoCorrectionTooltipOff.description: Tooltip for the auto-correction setting when OFF.

settingUseHistoryContextLabel.message: Include past input in auto-correction context
settingUseHistoryContextLabel.description: Label for the setting to enable/disable including past input in context during auto-correction.

settingUseHistoryContextTooltipOn.message: Include past input in auto-correction context ON
settingUseHistoryContextTooltipOn.description: Tooltip for the use-history-context setting when ON.

settingUseHistoryContextTooltipOff.message: Include past input in auto-correction context OFF
settingUseHistoryContextTooltipOff.description: Tooltip for the use-history-context setting when OFF.

modalSettingsButtonCancel.description: Cancel button text in the settings modal.

modalSettingsButtonSave.description: Save button text in the settings modal.

historyPanelEmpty.description: Message shown when history is empty.

logDomObserverStart.description: Log message when the DOM observer starts.

logSpaNavigationDetected.message: SPA navigation detected: New textareas found
logSpaNavigationDetected.description: Log message when SPA navigation is detected.

logSpaUiReinit.message: Executing UI reinitialization after SPA navigation
logSpaUiReinit.description: Log message when reinitializing UI after SPA navigation.

logPollingUiNotFound.message: Polling check: UI not found, reinitializing
logPollingUiNotFound.description: Log message when UI is not found during polling check.

logForceSetSuccess.description: Log message when force setting textarea value succeeds.

logForceSetError.description: Log message when force setting textarea value fails.

logTypingSimulateError.description: Log message when typing simulation fails.

logPaperPlaneButtonFound.message: Paper plane icon submit button found
logPaperPlaneButtonFound.description: Log message when the paper plane submit button is found.

logBgPrimaryButtonFound.message: Submit button with bg-primary/40 class found
logBgPrimaryButtonFound.description: Log message when a submit button with bg-primary/40 class is found.

logPaperPlaneButtonDisabled.message: Paper plane submit button is disabled. Triggering React state update...
logPaperPlaneButtonDisabled.description: Log message when the paper plane button is disabled.

logSubmitButtonDisabled.message: Submit button is disabled. Triggering React state update...
logSubmitButtonDisabled.description: Log message when the submit button is disabled.

logStateUpdateError.description: Log message when triggering state update fails.

logSubmitButtonCandidates.description: Log message showing submit button candidates.

logInitializing.message: Initializing Enhanced Voice Input Script v$version$ (Extension)...

logSpeechNotSupported.message: This browser does not support Speech Recognition.
logSpeechNotSupported.description: Log message when Speech Recognition API is not supported.

alertSpeechNotSupported.message: Your browser does not support Speech Recognition.
alertSpeechNotSupported.description: Alert message when Speech Recognition API is not supported.

logUiAlreadyExists.description: Log message when UI elements already exist.

logInitializationComplete.message: Enhanced Voice Input Script v$version$ (Extension) initialization complete.
logInitializationComplete.description: Log message when initialization is complete.

logSettingsLoaded.description: Log message when settings are loaded.

logApiKeySet.description: Log part indicating API key is set.

logApiKeyNotSet.description: Log part indicating API key is not set.

logSettingsLoadError.description: Log message when loading settings fails.

logSettingsSaved.description: Log message when settings (API key, language) are saved.

logSettingsSaveError.description: Log message when saving settings fails.

alertApiKeyMissing.message: API key is not set. Please set it via the settings button.
alertApiKeyMissing.description: Alert message when API key is missing during save attempt.

alertApiKeyInvalid.message: Invalid API key format. It must start with 'sk-'.
alertApiKeyInvalid.description: Alert message for invalid API key format during save attempt.

logApiKeySaveError.description: Log message when saving API key fails.

statusSettingsSaveSuccess.description: Status message when settings are saved successfully.

statusSettingsSaveError.description: Status message when saving settings fails.

alertSpeechApiNotAvailable.message: Speech Recognition API is not available.
alertSpeechApiNotAvailable.description: Alert message when Speech Recognition API is not available.

logCorrectionError.description: Log message for general correction error.

logCorrectionErrorAppend.description: Log message for correction error in append mode.

logCorrectionErrorOverwrite.description: Log message for correction error in overwrite mode.

logSpeechRecognitionError.description: Log message for speech recognition error.

logSpeechStartError.description: Log message when starting speech recognition fails.

logSpeechStopError.description: Log message when stopping speech recognition fails.

logSpecificTextareaFound.description: Log message when the specific textarea is found.

logSimilarTextareaFound.description: Log message when a similar textarea is found.

logTailwindTextareaFound.description: Log message when a Tailwind styled textarea is found.

logMessageTextareaFound.description: Log message when a message textarea is found.

logEventDispatchErrorAppend.description: Log message for event dispatch error in append mode.

logOpenAiApiError.description: Log message for OpenAI API error.

logOpenAiApiResponseUnexpected.description: Log message for unexpected OpenAI API response.

logProofreadRequestError.description: Log message for GPT proofread request error.

logReactTypingSimulated.message: React support: Input via typing simulation
logReactTypingSimulated.description: Log message when React typing simulation is used.

logFallbackMethod.description: Log message when using the fallback input method.

logEventDispatchErrorFallback.description: Log message for event dispatch error in fallback mode.

logUiNotFoundHealing.message: UI elements not found. Attempting regeneration...
logUiNotFoundHealing.description: Log message when UI elements are not found during self-healing.

logExtensionLoaded.message: Enhanced Universal Voice Input (Chrome Extension) loaded.
logExtensionLoaded.description: Log message when the extension has finished loading.

logApiKeyMissingSkip.message: API key not set, skipping GPT correction.
logApiKeyMissingSkip.description: Log message when skipping GPT correction due to missing API key.

logApiRequestFailedUseOriginal.message: API request failed ($status$). Using original text.
logApiRequestFailedUseOriginal.description: Log message when API request fails and original text is used.

logApiResponseUnexpected.message: Unexpected response from OpenAI API. Using original text.
logApiResponseUnexpected.description: Log message when API response is unexpected and original text is used.

logCorrectionRequestErrorUseOriginal.message: Error during GPT correction request. Using original text.
logCorrectionRequestErrorUseOriginal.description: Log message when correction request fails and original text is used.

statusProcessingInProgress.message: Another process is in progress. Please wait until it completes.
statusProcessingInProgress.description: Status message when another processing is already in progress.

statusSubmitDisabled.description: Status message when the submit button is disabled.

statusSubmitClicked.description: Status message when the submit button is clicked.

statusAutoDetectOff.message: Auto-detect input fields is OFF. Please click on an input field directly.
statusAutoDetectOff.description: Status message when auto-detect input fields is turned off.

statusUsingModalDialog.message: No input field found. Voice recognition results will be displayed in a modal window.
statusUsingModalDialog.description: Status message shown when no input field is found and modal dialog will be used.

recognitionModalTitle.description: Title for the recognition result modal dialog.

recognitionModalSubmitButton.description: Submit button text in the recognition result modal dialog.

recognitionModalCopyButton.description: Copy button text in the recognition result modal dialog.

recognitionModalCopied.description: Text shown after copying in the recognition result modal dialog.

recognitionModalClearButton.description: Clear button text in the recognition result modal dialog.

recognitionModalCloseButton.description: Close button text in the recognition result modal dialog.

Modal Toggle
Switch between modal and direct input modes

modalHideTooltip.description: Tooltip for hiding the modal window.

statusModalVisible.description: Status message when modal window is visible.

statusModalHidden.message: Modal display: OFF (direct input to field)

statusThemeDark.description: Status message when theme is switched to dark.

modalSettingsThemeLabel.description: Label for the theme selection dropdown in settings.
